verses.1: Tua ciangin Topa in Job kiangah,
verses.2: “Job aw, nangmah in Vanglian Pasian nong dem hi. Tu-in khawl ding na hiam, ahih kei leh keima thugen nong dawng ding hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
verses.4: “ Topa aw, ka hai pau kha hi. Hong bangci dawn theih ding ka hi hiam? Tu a kipanin ka pau nawn kei ding hi.
verses.5: Ka gen dinga kilawm zahval gen kha ka hih manin, tu a kipanin ka pau nawn het kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin huihpi sung panin Topa in Job tungah thu genkik a,
verses.7: “Kipasalsakin ding to inla, ka thudotnate hong dawng in.
verses.8: Kei a thutang loin hong seh a, nang thutang kisa-in kei hong mawhsak na hi hiam?
verses.9: Kei zahin nang hat na hi hiam? Keiʼ awging zahin nang aʼ ging zo ding ahi hiam?
verses.10: Na ngap nakleh na minthan nading le na kihihsak theih nadingin tu-in hong kipan inla, minthanna le minliatna ngah ta in.
verses.11: A kiphasak mite en inla, na hehna tawh amaute niamkhiat gawp in.
verses.12: Mi kiphasakte en inla, amaute niamkhiat gawp in. Migilote khempeuh a omna mun munah tuancil in.
verses.13: Amaute khempeuh lei sungah phumcip inla, misiteʼ gam sungah amaute khihcip in.
verses.14: Tua bangin na hih zawh nakleh nang a hong phat masa pen pa, nang a gualzo pa na hihna thu a hong phawk masa pen pa ka hi ding hi.
verses.15: “Tui-sakol ganhing golpi ngaihsun dih in. Amah le nang a piangsak pa keimah ka hi hi. Amah in bawngtal bangin lopa bek mah ne a,
verses.16: ahi zongin ama pum sungah bangzah hatna om a, bangzah ta-in a sazang khauh ahi hiam?
verses.17: Ama mei, taamtak sing bangin khauhin tal po veva a, a khe-a a sazangte hat pha mahmah hi.
verses.18: Ama guhte sumngo bangin khauh a, ama khete sikzawl bangin a khauh hi.
verses.19: “Ganhing khempeuh lak pan a lamdang pen hi a, amah a Piangsak pa bek mah in amah a zo zo ahi hi.
verses.20: Gamsate omna mual tung panin ama an ding lopa kipuak hi.
verses.21: Amah lingkung nuai ah lum a, nawng sunga pumpeeng lakah a bu hi.
verses.22: Lingkungte le lui gei-a gialhek kungte in ama ading niliim piangsak hi.
verses.23: Amah in gun tuikhangte kihta het lo a, tuikhang in ama maitang a nawk gawp hangin nuam takin om thei veve hi.
verses.24: Kua in ama mit tawsakin man zo ding ahi hiam? Kua in a nakpheh ah khau vawh zo ding ahi hiam?
